definition: a tall vertical cylindrical architectural structure standing upright and used to support a structure
details:
noun
- a tall vertical cylindrical architectural structure standing upright and used to support a structure
= example: a tall vertical cylindrical architectural structure standing upright and used to support a structure
= synonyms: pillar
- a vertical cylindrical structure standing alone and not supporting anything (such as a monument)
= synonyms: pillar
- a vertical glass tube used in column chromatography
= synonyms: chromatography column
- any tubular or pillar-like supporting structure in the body
- a page or text that is vertically divided
= example: a page or text that is vertically divided
- an article giving opinions or perspectives
= synonyms: editorial
- a line of units following one after another
- a vertical array of numbers or other information
= example: a vertical array of numbers or other information
- anything that approximates the shape of a column or tower
= example: anything that approximates the shape of a column or tower
= synonyms: pillar, tower
